Package main.payments

Class ApplePay

java.lang.Object
main.payments.ApplePay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, AddBalanceAction, Payment
public class ApplePay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Payment, AddBalanceAction
implements a type of payment with a maximum amount of 1000.00 as an AddBalanceAction

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(User user)
      Accepts an input from user and checks if not above maximum amount. if yes: amount added to balance if no: inform user about failure to add
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Action
      Specified by:
